summary: This week's mostly infrastructure and bug fixes â€” cleaned up the timeline's backfill API, added a unified AI gateway for Lumen, and fixed a bunch of flaky tests. The Gallery curio is now live in the navbar, and the Museum's exhibit pages will build as static HTML. Also migrated from marked to markdown-it for better rendering.

features: add social media logo variants with dark background (#418)
add greenhouse mode for internal testing (#423)
circular favicon and social logos with transparent corners
add email signature dividers with organized folder structure
add Art Exhibit section to knowledge base (#429)
add LinkPreview component and OG metadata fetcher (#432)
simplify to Seedling-only for phase 1 launch (#427)
scaffold all wing structure with placeholder exhibits (#433)
add 125% scaled dividers with seasonal backgrounds

replace R2 with Amber terminology and add safety warnings
add Gallery to navbar when curio is enabled
add historical backfill button to admin UI
fixes: remove invalid developer category from knowledge base
add Burrow spec to knowledge base
resolve CI failures for landing and plant deployments
improve TableOfContents positioning and scrollbar behavior
increase TOC top offset to 6.5rem for navbar clearance
add isolated error handling to prevent 500 on missing tables
add trustedOrigins config for proxy CSRF validation
correct Pages project name for engine deployment
disable SvelteKit CSRF, validate form actions in hooks
replace Events API with Commits API in generate endpoint
fetch real commit stats and fix markdown link rendering
add prerender flags so exhibit pages build as static HTML
refactoring: move workshop and beyond to top-level routes (#426)
move Burrow to bottom of Core Services
docs: add repository snapshot and release summary for v0.9.85
update README logo to high-resolution variant (#420)
remove "made me cry" from Jonas Delva credit (#421)
add Burrow naming journey for cross-property access (#424)
update Timeline Curio status + add backfilling task (#430)
add multi-tenant proxy CSRF troubleshooting guide

tests: comprehensive test improvement - real integration tests, SSRF fix, router coverage (#439)
chores: temporarily hide Pantry from Workshop page
add DO/migrator CI/CD, fix workflow issues, remove dead code
update lockfile after vineyard workspace addition
